data.text: @SenatorLankford @SenateGOP Why did you vote with Democrats to fund illegals????

@SenatorLankford @SenateGOP I fell in love with you at Falls Creek and have voted for you several times but never again. You have failed us. I just explained to my 4 grown daughters how you have betrayed us. It’s time for you to go.

@SenatorLankford @SenateGOP You delivered nothing for Oklahomans.  You have been voting with the Dems more and more.  We have had enough.  Your political career is done.  You tried to Mike Pence us and we all see that now!

@SenatorLankford @SenateGOP Just to hand it over to illegal aliens and NGO.
Shame on you. https://t.co/RQvnXYqVbF

@SenatorLankford @SenateGOP DOJ and FBI have ALL the Epstein videos.  How hard is it to review the videos and arrest EVERYONE having sex with a minor?  We the People do not give a shit if it burns our government to the ground.  Arrest the billionaires, Hollywood Actors and Politicians.  Arrest them ALL!!
@BrandSlaughter5 @SenatorLankford @SenateGOP Gives me hope here in Edmond.
@SenatorLankford @SenateGOP We have to primary this clown!

@SenatorLankford @SenateGOP Hitler playbook. Dehumanize, destroy. 

DENOUNCE THIS.
This is yet another red line Trump has trampled on. 

Disgusting and intolerable racism.  

The old man is completely unhinged. https://t.co/kDqYh5cdsr
